Create a detailed itinerary with suggested stops, including popular tourist attractions, national parks, and scenic routes.
Research and book accommodations ahead of time, including hotels, camping sites, and vacation rentals.
Plan for meals and snacks by researching local restaurants and grocery stores, and making a list of must-try dishes and items.
Create a playlist of music and audiobooks for the road trip, and pack a portable charger and extra batteries.
Make sure to have a first aid kit, flashlights, and extra supplies in case of any emergencies or unexpected situations.
